item.title: One of my favorite ways to eat potatoes… RÖSTI! 😍 And y‘all went crazy for the recipe, so here you go…👇 Recipe (1 big Rösti, 20mins prep time): -5 medium potatoes, peeled Grate and squeeze out the excess moisture. -4 Tbsp flour -salt to taste Stir well.
